name: Dwaft Hunter
description:
Short Platformer with light combat ability, about 15 minutes of play.

Simple goal keeps going right, you get about 10 hits before you die from a basic foe. there will be a lot of bugs as this is my first game ever If I notice any, I will work on fixing them.

You can't walk on stone it's there as a bug fix that way foes don't walk off the edge.

YouTube Link to other projects or to better notify me of errors.

https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCTA7I_z9SSdiQEZE6hqex8A
